sources.name: Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Pop Division 2015
sources.description:
Data published by United Nations Population Division 2015
Linkhttp://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Mortality/
Retrieved29 February 2016

Additional information

The original data refers to intervals of 5 years. Here the data is assigned the last year of that original interval. For example 1955 refers to 1950-1955.

variables.name: Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Pop Division 2015
variables.coverage: Global by country and word region
